sql.statement: create table if not exists director (_id integer primary key autoincrement, director_name text not null, director_hire_cost integer, director_reputation integer)
create table if not exists actor (_id integer primary key autoincrement, actor_name text not null, actor_hire_cost integer, actor_reputation integer)

create table if not exists movie (_id integer primary key autoincrement, movie_name text, tagline text, description text, genre_id integer, earnings integer, cost integer, producer_id integer, director_id integer, distributor_id integer)
create table if not exists genre (_id integer primary key autoincrement, genre_name text)
create table if not exists production_company (_id text primary key, name text, reputation integer, budget integer)
create table if not exists cast (movie_id integer, actor_id integer)
create table if not exists distributor (_id integer primary key autoincrement, distributor_desc text, distributor_name text)
insert into movie (movie_name, tagline, genre_id, earnings, cost, producer_id, director_id, distributor_id) values ('Avatar', 'Enter the world', 1, 760, 310, 1, 1, 1)
